whole_object: It seems the TV's not the only thing with great reception—those coat hangers are really picking up the vibe!
single_object:
- TV: This TV is so smart, it teaches the remote control new tricks!
- Game console: Rather being console-d after a long day, this game console cheers you up with a bit of play!
- Remote control: This remote has control issues—it never lets the TV change its own channels.
- TV stand: This stand-up piece of furniture never TVs away from holding your attention.
- DVD player: The DVD player is so old school, it still thinks high definition is a well-explained dictionary.
- Stereo receiver: This stereo receiver is so charismatic, it's got all the radio waves crushing on it.
- Game controller: The game controller is such a mover and shaker, it keeps pressing its own buttons.
- Laptop: This laptop is such a lap hog, it thinks your knees are its personal recliner.
- Speaker: The speaker always thought it would excel at hide and seek, but it turns out it can only blast its hiding spot.
- Rug: The rug has such a complex personality, it sweeps you off your feet while still letting you walk all over it.
multi_object:
- TV  
- Game console  
- "The TV said it was tired of being the center of attention, but the game console just couldn't stop playing the hero!"

- Game console  
- Remote control  
- "The game console tried to take control, but the remote said, 'Not on my watch!'"

- Remote control  
- DVD player  
- "The remote control felt like a magician, making the DVD player disappear into a sea of forgotten movies!"

- TV stand  
- Stereo receiver  
- "The TV stand claimed it was the backbone of the setup, but the stereo receiver just laughed and said, 'I’m the one with the bass!'"

- DVD player  
- Laptop  
- "The DVD player sighed, 'I used to be the star, but now the laptop streams all the drama!'"

- Stereo receiver  
- Speaker  
- "The stereo receiver boasted about its sound quality, but the speaker just turned up the volume on its own ego!"

- Game controller  
- Rug  
- "The game controller tried to play it cool, but the rug said, 'You’re just a little too wired for my taste!'"

- Laptop  
- TV  
- "The laptop thought it was the smartest device in the room, but the TV just rolled its eyes and said, 'I’ve got the bigger screen!'"

- Speaker  
- Game console  
- "The speaker was ready to drop the beat, but the game console said, 'Hold on, I’m about to drop a new level!'" 

- Rug  
- Remote control  
- "The rug felt like a cozy blanket, but the remote control insisted, 'I’m the one who really knows how to cover ground!'"

multi_object_dict.object_sentence: "The TV said it was tired of being the center of attention, but the game console just couldn't stop playing the hero!"
"The game console tried to take control, but the remote said, 'Not on my watch!'"
"The remote control felt like a magician, making the DVD player disappear into a sea of forgotten movies!"
"The TV stand claimed it was the backbone of the setup, but the stereo receiver just laughed and said, 'I’m the one with the bass!'"
"The DVD player sighed, 'I used to be the star, but now the laptop streams all the drama!'"
"The stereo receiver boasted about its sound quality, but the speaker just turned up the volume on its own ego!"
"The game controller tried to play it cool, but the rug said, 'You’re just a little too wired for my taste!'"
"The laptop thought it was the smartest device in the room, but the TV just rolled its eyes and said, 'I’ve got the bigger screen!'"
"The speaker was ready to drop the beat, but the game console said, 'Hold on, I’m about to drop a new level!'"
"The rug felt like a cozy blanket, but the remote control insisted, 'I’m the one who really knows how to cover ground!'"
